meanings.sent1: She was reluctant to try the new food.
meanings.sent2: He felt reluctant to speak in front of the class.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked reluctant to wear the tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed reluctant to rise on that gloomy morning.
meanings.sent5: The child's reluctant steps towards the dentist's chair showed her fear.

meanings.sent1: The student's reluctant expression revealed his uncertainty.
meanings.sent2: The dog's reluctant wag of the tail indicated his hesitation.
meanings.sent3: The tree seemed reluctant to let go of its last leaf.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was reluctant, hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The old car's reluctant engine sputtered to life after many tries.
